import React,{useState} from 'react'; const trains=[ {id:'t1',nom:'Buraq',villes:[]}, {id:'t2',nom:'Gazel', villes:[]}, {id:'t3',nom:'Eagle-Wins', villes:[]}, {id:'t4',nom:'Fennec', villes:[]}, ] export default function App() { const [id,setId]=useState() const [list,setLists]=useState() const [ville,setVille]=useState('') function rechercher(){ setLists(trains.find((t)=> t.id===id)) } function ajouter_ville(){ if(list){ list.villes.push(ville) } } return (

Gestion des trains

Id Train setId(e.target.value)} className='form-control' style={{width:'60%'}}/>
Nom
Ville Depart
Ville terminus
Nouvelle ville de passage setVille(e.target.value)}/>
{ list.villes.map((nomV,indx)=>{ return }) }

{nomV} {indx+1}
) }
